item.title: Pair Blogging: The Epoch
item.description: AD: So how do we write a blog post together Vito? VC: What do you want to write about? AD: I donâ€™t know What should we? Tech? Culture? Life? Letâ€™s do it bro VC: Sure UX maybe ðŸ˜Š inclusive UX? AD: That isnâ€™t bad Something we have strong opinions about Or maybe contrasting opinions Hah! VC: but I tend to eventually agree with yours though ðŸ˜Š AD: Other way round lol!

item.title: Writing, 2020
item.description: In the past, I used to write long form blogs, with proper sentences and paragraphs :) Restarting my site this 2020, I think it may not be effective anymore: Slow to write: which means I write less, not a bad thing, but I want to record more, for memory. Slow to read: I don’t think most readers have time / patience to read long form by someone like me, I am not Paul Graham, not that he write too long too.
